results.title: Influence of cardiopulmonary bypass on the plasma concentrations of atenolol.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Plasma @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was quantified in six blood samples collected during the preoperative period from seven @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@coronary insufficiency@@@ and surgical indication, chronically treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ PO 25 to 100 mg/day.

citations.NLM: Leite Fda S, dos Santos LM, Bonafé WW, Chignalia AZ, Carmona MJ, Suyama MJ, Malbouisson LM, Auler JO Jr, Santos SR. Influence of cardiopulmonary bypass on the plasma concentrations of atenolol. Arq Bras Cardiol. 2007 Jun;88(6):637-42. PMID: 17664990
citations.BibTeX: @article{17664990, title={Influence of cardiopulmonary bypass on the plasma concentrations of atenolol.}, author={Leite Fda S and dos Santos LM and Bonafé WW and Chignalia AZ and Carmona MJ and Suyama MJ and Malbouisson LM and Auler JO Jr and Santos SR}, journal={Arq Bras Cardiol}, volume={88}, number={6}, pages={637-42}}

results.title: A micromethod for the quantification of atenolol in plasma using high-performance liquid chromatography with fluorescence detection: therapeutic drug monitoring of two patients with severe coronary insufficiency before cardiac surgery.
results.text_hl: A micromethod for the quantification of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in plasma using high-performance liquid chromatography with fluorescence detection: therapeutic drug monitoring of two @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with severe @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@coronary insufficiency@@@ before cardiac surgery.

citations.NLM: Leite Fda S, Pereira VA, Omosako CE, Carmona MJ, Auler JO Jr, Santos SR. A micromethod for the quantification of atenolol in plasma using high-performance liquid chromatography with fluorescence detection: therapeutic drug monitoring of two patients with severe coronary insufficiency before cardiac surgery. Ther Drug Monit. 2006 Apr;28(2):237-44. PMID: 16628137
citations.BibTeX: @article{16628137, title={A micromethod for the quantification of atenolol in plasma using high-performance liquid chromatography with fluorescence detection: therapeutic drug monitoring of two patients with severe coronary insufficiency before cardiac surgery.}, author={Leite Fda S and Pereira VA and Omosako CE and Carmona MJ and Auler JO Jr and Santos SR}, journal={Ther Drug Monit}, volume={28}, number={2}, pages={237-44}}

results.title: Extra-corporeal life support for near-fatal multi-drug intoxication: a case report
results.text_hl: A 36-year-old Caucasian man presented to our hospital with refractory @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@, severe @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@cardiac insufficiency@@@ and @DISEASE_Multiple_Organ_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D009102 @@@multi-organ failure@@@ due to mixed intoxication with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@Lacidipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sertraline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020280 @@@sertraline@@@.

citations.NLM: Rona R, Cortinovis B, Marcolin R, Patroniti N, Isgrò S, Marelli C, Fumagalli R. Extra-corporeal life support for near-fatal multi-drug intoxication: a case report J Med Case Rep. 2011 Jun 23;5():231. PMID: 21699679
citations.BibTeX: @article{21699679, title={Extra-corporeal life support for near-fatal multi-drug intoxication: a case report}, author={Rona R and Cortinovis B and Marcolin R and Patroniti N and Isgrò S and Marelli C and Fumagalli R}, journal={J Med Case Rep}, volume={5}, pages={231}}
